channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Campaign
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Campaign

item.title: CVE-2019-4384|2024-09-17T01:31:41.663Z -- ibm -- campaign
item.description: IBM Campaign 9.1.2 and 10.1 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 162172.

item.title: CVE-2017-1114|2024-09-17T03:34:20.991Z -- ibm -- campaign
item.description: IBM Campaign 9.1, 9.1.2, and 10 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 121152.

item.title: CVE-2017-1116|2024-09-17T01:51:17.697Z -- ibm -- campaign
item.description: IBM Campaign 8.6, 9.0, 9.1, 9.1.1, 9.1.2, and 10.0 contains excessive details on the client side which could provide information useful for an authenticated user to conduct other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 121154.
